modules.serial_labware.Heidolph_MR_Hei_Connect.Heidolph_MR_Hei_Connect module¶

class modules.serial_labware.Heidolph_MR_Hei_Connect.Heidolph_MR_Hei_Connect.MRHeiConnect(port=None, connect_on_instantiation=False, soft_fail_for_testing=False)[source]¶

Bases: SerialDevice.serial_labware.SerialDevice

This provides a python class for the Heidolph MR Hei Connect The command implementation is based on the German manual version 1.3

keepalive()[source]¶

Queries the stirrer status every 5 seconds to reset the watchdog. Overrides dummy keepalive from parent method.
